Html:
I can't seem to get the autoscaffold page working.
I got the latest build (2627) and got the .Data project adjusted to my DB. According to the instructions I created the new Clubstarterkit.data.dll which is placed automatically in the bin of the web during building website.
I didn't change the web.config settings for the subsonic provider.

Still I am getting the error of
<p>SubSonic was unable to load a provider or connect to a database. This is usually caused by a configuration error in Web.Config.</p>

The website runs perfectly so it cannot be a db problem.

Does anybody have any pointers for me?
The auto-scaffold should work. Did you change the references in the web.config to point to your db? You can just copy the info from the app.config to the web.config. Try that.
